heading: Right to equal pay
description: According to the provisions listed under the Equal Remuneration Act, one cannot be discriminated on the basis of sex when it comes to salary, pay or wages.Working women have the right to draw an equal salary, as compared to men.

heading: Right against workplace harassment
description: The Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace Act gives a female the right to file a complaint against any kind of sexual harassment at her place of work.Under this act, she can submit a written complaint to an Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) at a branch office within a period of 3 months.

heading: Right to dignity and decency
description: In an event that the accused is a woman, any medical examination procedure on her must be performed by -- or in the presence of -- another woman.
